categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Duumas was a male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order around the time of the Ruusan Reformation, a major movement in the Galactic Senate and the Order to bring society into a time of peace historians would call the Golden Age of the Old Republic.

A Force-sensitive, Duumas was a member of the Jedi Order trained in the ways of the Force and eventually attained the rank of Jedi Master. Around the time of the Ruusan Reformation which swept the Galactic Republic and the Order, under the leadership of Supreme Chancellor Tarsus Valorum and Grand Master Fae Coven, Master Duumas uncovered the Prophecy of the Child of Light. The prophecy foretold the coming of a Child of Light who would need protection from the dark side of the Force. Directed by the Force, Master Duumas traveled to the planet Dalicron-4 merged his spirit with an ancient tree, around which a void in the Force was formed.

Nearly a millennium later, Jedi Gel fled the Great Jedi Purge initiated by the Galactic Empire and wound up on Dalicron-4. Discovering the void surrounding an ancient tree, Gel set up a small farm and started a family. His grandson, Caeleb, came to live here as well, protected from the prying eyes of the Empire by the Force-dampening effects of the tree's Force-void. The child, indeed the child of prophecy, was protected from the Sith even after he was turned over to the protective custody of the Alliance to Restore the Republic for he held on to a leaf from the tree, which had retained the protective effect of Duumas' spirit.
